00008 void AdditiveWeightChange::update_activity(double time,Interconnection * Connection,bool spike){
00009         // CHANGED
00010         // VERSION USING ANALYTICALLY SOLVED EQUATIONS
00011         float delta_t = (time-Connection->GetLastSpikeTime());
00012         float tau = 0.1;
00013         float quot = delta_t/tau;
00014         float ex = exp(-quot);
00015 
00016         float OldE1 = Connection->GetActivityAt(0);
00017         float OldE = Connection->GetActivityAt(1);
00018         float NewE = (OldE+quot*OldE1)*ex;
00019         float NewE1 = OldE1*ex; 
00020         
00021         if(spike){  // if spike, we need to increase the e1 variable
00022                 NewE1 += 1;
00023         }
00024         
00025         Connection->SetActivityAt(0,NewE1);
00026         Connection->SetActivityAt(1,NewE);
00027 }
00028 
00029 void AdditiveWeightChange::ApplyWeightChange(Interconnection * Connection, double SpikeTime){
00030         
00031         // Second case: the weight change is linked to this connection
00032         float NewWeight = Connection->GetWeight()+this->GetA1Pre();
00033 
00034         // CHANGED
00035         update_activity(SpikeTime,Connection, true);
00036         
00037         if(NewWeight>Connection->GetMaxWeight())
00038                 NewWeight=Connection->GetMaxWeight();
00039         else if(NewWeight<0.0)
00040                 NewWeight=0.0;
00041         
00042         Connection->SetLastSpikeTime(SpikeTime);        
00043         Connection->SetWeight(NewWeight);
00044         
00045         if(this->GetTrigger() == 1){
00046                 for(int i=0; i<Connection->GetTarget()->GetInputNumber(); ++i){
00047                         Interconnection * interi=Connection->GetTarget()->GetInputConnectionAt(i);
00048                     WeightChange * wchani=interi->GetWeightChange();
00049                     if (wchani!=0){
00050                         //CHANGED
00051                         update_activity(SpikeTime,interi, false);
00052                         float NewWeight = interi->GetWeight()+wchani->GetA2PrePre()*interi->GetActivityAt(1);
00053                         //
00054                         if(NewWeight>interi->GetMaxWeight())
00055                                 NewWeight=interi->GetMaxWeight();
00056                         else if(NewWeight<0.0)
00057                                 NewWeight=0.0;
00058                                 
00059                         interi->SetWeight(NewWeight);
00060                     }
00061                 }
00062         }
00063 }
